definition: any of various more-or-less horizontal spars or poles used to extend the foot of a sail or for handling cargo or in mooring, to grow vigorously
details:
noun
- any of various more-or-less horizontal spars or poles used to extend the foot of a sail or for handling cargo or in mooring
- a pole carrying an overhead microphone projected over a film or tv set
= synonyms: microphone boom
- a deep prolonged loud noise
= synonyms: roaring
- a sudden happening that brings good fortune, as a sudden opportunity to make money
= example: a sudden happening that brings good fortune, as a sudden opportunity to make money
= synonyms: gold rush
- a state of economic prosperity
verb
- to grow vigorously
= example: to grow vigorously
= synonyms: flourish, expand, thrive
- to hit hard
= example: to hit hard
= synonyms: blast
- to make a deep hollow sound
= example: to make a deep hollow sound
= synonyms: boom out
- to make a resonant sound, like thunder, fireworks, or artillery
= example: to make a resonant sound, like thunder, fireworks, or artillery
= synonyms: din
